issue.title: www.ebay.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:

comment.body:
This one fixed:

> `@@||ebay.com^$jsinject,elemhide,extension` + `@@||ebay.com^$stealth` 

All other alone failed.
